With the increasing trend of population aging in China, the number of elderly cancer patients is growing year by year. They often face complex situations such as multiple co-existing diseases, polypharmacy, and declining physiological functions, leading to increased medication risks and poor medication adherence, which seriously affects treatment efficacy and quality of life.

en.系统化梳理和组织老年肿瘤用药相关的知识，包括药物信息、疾病信息、症状、不良反应、: Systematically sorting out and organizing knowledge related to elderly cancer medication, including drug information, disease information, symptoms, adverse reactions, interactions, etc., to form a structured knowledge network, laying the foundation for precise retrieval and intelligent recommendations.
en.基于知识图谱，提供多维度、层级化的信息筛选方式，帮助用户快速定位到所需的科普内容: Based on the knowledge graph, it provides multi-dimensional and hierarchical information filtering methods to help users quickly locate the required popular science content.
en.通过分析用户提供的个人情况（如肿瘤类型、年龄、合并症等）和浏览行为，构建用户画像: By analyzing the personal information (such as cancer type, age, comorbidities, etc.) and browsing behavior provided by users, user profiles are constructed, and machine learning algorithms (such as collaborative filtering, content-based recommendations, etc.) are used to achieve personalized popular science information push.
en.本平台提供的所有科普信息均来源于权威医学指南、专业医学文献、以及临床药学专家的经: All popular science information provided by this platform comes from authoritative medical guidelines, professional medical literature, and the experience summaries of clinical pharmacy experts. We will do our best to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the information. The project team is composed of pharmacy experts and technical personnel from the Affiliated Cancer Hospital of Chongqing University, dedicated to providing high-quality popular science content.
en.重要提示：本网站提供的所有信息仅用于科普教育目的，不能替代任何专业的医疗诊断、治: Important Note: All information provided on this website is for popular science education purposes only and cannot replace any professional medical diagnosis, treatment advice, or prescription. The medication regimen for elderly cancer patients is complex and highly individualized. Please be sure to carry out treatment and medication adjustments under the guidance of a professional physician or pharmacist.
en.若您在浏览本网站内容后有任何关于自身健康状况或治疗方案的疑问，请及时咨询您的主治: If you have any questions about your health condition or treatment plan after browsing the content of this website, please consult your attending physician or relevant medical professional in a timely manner. This platform assumes no responsibility for any direct or indirect losses caused by any actions taken in reliance on the information on this website.
